title: 服务器后台报错，然后服务器就炸了！
author: 丶Anni
txt_content:
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]: java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_IOERR]  Some kind of disk I/O error occurred (out of memory)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.DB.throwex(DB.java:374)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.NativeDB._open(Native Method)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.DB.open(DB.java:86)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.Conn.open(Conn.java:140)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.Conn.<init>(Conn.java:57)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.JDBC.createConnection(JDBC.java:77)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at org.sqlite.JDBC.connect(JDBC.java:64)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at net.coreprotect.database.Database.getConnection(Database.java:57)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:26)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:49)
[18:31:21] [Thread-12/WARN]:  at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
  我不想知道是什么问题！我只想要怎么样解决！

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
多半是LWC，参考我以前的回答
http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-679845-1-1.html

replies.author: 丶Anni
replies.txt_content:
浅念哥 发表于 2017-5-5 20:12
多半是LWC，参考我以前的回答
http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-679845-1-1.html
服务器人多就延迟好高！

replies.author: 丶Anni
replies.txt_content:
浅念哥 发表于 2017-5-5 20:12
多半是LWC，参考我以前的回答
http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-679845-1-1.html
还有，去服务端板块下载有LWC的服务端，将DLL复制过去
这个怎么样搞？
